Reviews.Title: Great little camera - still going strong.
Reviews.Author: Marc Gothison
Reviews.Content: I bought two other almost identical products (http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B003YZXQXG/ref=oh_details_o01_s00_i01?ie=UTF8&psc;=1).A year later, they all still work perfectly!  I just don't understand why one sells for $80 and the other is $60.

Reviews.Title: Good.
Reviews.Author: Raymond E. Sears
Reviews.Content: This product is good but I would highly recommend to get cameras that are specifically made for the DVR. Example, I have a Night Owl DVR so I should get Night Owl cameras. I believe that only a few compatible cameras will work with this but after about a year, I ve lost my night vision on one of these cameras. I would be replacing it with a Night Owl camera.
